resources.string:
Hi my name is Mauricio Laine and I like cats. This one of my favourites songs: [Verse 1] You know that it would be untrue You know that I would be a liar If I was to say to you Girl, we couldn\'t get much higher
[Chorus] Come on baby, light my fire Come on baby, light my fire Try to set the night on fire
[Verse 2] The time to hesitate is through No time to wallow in the mire Try now we can only lose And our love become a funeral pyre
[Chorus] Come on baby, light my fire Come on baby, light my fire Try to set the night on fire Yeahâ€¦
[Bridge]
[Verse 2] The time to hesitate is through No time to wallow in the mire Try now we can only lose And our love become a funeral pyre
[Chorus] Come on baby, light my fire Come on baby, light my fire Try to set the night on fire Yeah
[Verse 1] You know that it would be untrue You know that I would be a liar If I was to say to you Girl, we couldn't get much higher
[Chorus] Come on baby, light my fire Come on baby, light my fire Try to set the night on fire Try to set the night on fire Try to set the night on fire Try to set the night on fire
